desc.cn: SCM WorkBench 是一个 GUI，可以方便地以 PySVN WorkBench 的风格使用 Git、 Mercurial (hg)和 Subversion (svn)存储库
desc.en: SCM Workbench is a GUI to easily work with Git, Mercurial (hg) and Subversion (svn) repositories in the style of PySVN WorkBench

fedora/dnf.cmd:
sudo dnf copr enable barryascott/tools
&& sudo dnf install scm-workbench
